1ban.title: Draft Sequence (1 Ban)
steps: Initial Bans: First Blue, then Red
First pick phase: Blue → Red → Red → Blue → Blue → Red
Second pick phase: Red → Blue → Blue → Red

2ban.title: Draft Sequence (2 Bans)
steps: Initial Bans: First Blue, then Red
First pick phase: Blue → Red → Red → Blue → Blue → Red
Second pick phase: Red → Blue → Blue → Red

3ban.title: Draft Sequence (3 Bans)
steps: Initial Bans: First Blue, then Red
First pick phase: Blue → Red → Red → Blue → Blue → Red
Secondary Bans: Red → Blue → Blue → Red
Second pick phase: Red → Blue → Blue → Red

specialFeatures.title: Special Features
features: The Empty Champion (first in the grid) can be selected multiple times
The timer can be paused and resumed with the pause button
If the timer expires, a random available champion will be selected automatically
Mirror Picks Active: Champions already selected are no longer available for subsequent selection even by the enemy team
